title: 229: Is Baker Mayfield a First-Rounder?
itunes:title: 229: Is Baker Mayfield a First-Rounder?
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks recap the Lions' road win over the Packers on Monday night (:15) and reveal their the most surprising last-place NFL teams (3:05). The guys also discuss the repercussions of Deshaun Watson's season-ending injury (11:35) and whether Oklahoma quarterback Baker Mayfield could be a first-round pick (13:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
